Study Skills - Activity

Virtual Classroom – Present key information on study skills in an engaging way, e.g. telling the story of a student completing their first assignment, or provide students with study skills resources that they review before the virtual session. Use polls and breakout rooms to have students make decisions individually and in groups, e.g. on what they think the student in the story should do at a particular juncture. This should promote discussion of, and reflection on, study skills.

Virtual Learning Environment – Provide study skills resources along with a quiz that students can take to assess their understanding of that content. Support this activity with an asynchronous discussion forum or a scheduled synchronous chat room session to focus on key points and answer student questions.
